page.title: 07MORETON- CLINICS AND CHEMIST
page.content: There is one{hospital}in Moreton. There we spoke to a sister and a health visitor about the baby{clinic.} About 50 babies are visited each year and they all have their injections at the clinic. There are other clinics where doctors can send a patient to see a specialist. There is an {optician}in Moreton who supplies and mends glasses and tests eyes. There is a{chemist}shop and the owner emphasised its importance in Moreton. The{chemist}dispenses about 2,000 prescriptions a month. If someone comes to the shop who the chemist thinks is too ill he will send them to a doctor. He has to supervise all the time the{chemist's}shop is open.The chemist sells{health foods}which are a very important part of his trading as people are looking for alternative ways of staying well.
